rules_text:
[i]The Saga of the Holy War[/i] – When Lewyn, The Keeper of Tales enters, each creature you control explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, put it into your hand. If you reveal a land card this way, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
[i]The Hero's Song[/i] – Legendary creature cards in your graveyard have retrace.
